title: Technical
items: leave code in a better shape than before
maintain code quality and monitor build failures

title: Leadership
items: write modular, well-tested and maintainable code
propose new ideas, performing feasability analysis and scoping the work
lead complex features and bug fixes with architectural perspective
improve the teams's tooling and process to make it more effective

title: Communication
items: give feedback to peers, in a positive way and always by being specific and giving ways to improve
